title: Blended Learning-Based Mathematics Team Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhanced mathematical problem-solving and team collaboration skills through asynchronous collaborative learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of solving mathematical problems using collaborative learning scenarios in a blended learning environment with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve mathematical problem-solving strategies at least three times by incorporating peer feedback via online discussion tools and shared documents.
Learners can self-assess their social competency levels through analysis of LMS-based collaborative activity logs.

resources: UML Activity Diagram-Based Learning Scenario Template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
